business

Interface Testable

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InventoryItemImpl

    public interface Testable
    Implementing this interface in EVERY new Business Class would force all programmers to use the design/testing methodoloy I use in my own work. Specifically, I create a formatDisplay() and update() instance methods and a getData() static method (but static methods like getData() do not form part of an interface).

      int update(java.lang.StringBuffer sb)
